name: drying_cancel
description: This function is used to cancel the drying operation on a specified compartment of the dryer.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the dryer is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the dryer is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name of the dryer that needs to be cancelled.

parameters.name: compartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment of the dryer that needs to be cancelled.
